overview.en: Opacity (OPCT) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Opacity has a current supply of 130,000,000 with 80,456,100 in circulation. The last known price of Opacity is 0.10370835 USD and is down -7.79 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 5 active market(s) with $95,301.07 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://opacity.io/.
